txt.en: The Red Sky Clan of Bhol Rûdh is up against impossible odds in their conflict with the forces of Seregost.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires Bhol Rûdh: Siege of Corruption to be underway. If that quest has been completed or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter this instance in order to complete this quest.</rgb>
'You have done well, friend. Your efforts will be duly noted!'

The Red Sky Clan of Bhol Rûdh is up against impossible odds in their conflict with the forces of Seregost.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>Warning: This quest requires Bhol Rûdh: Siege of Corruption to be underway. If that quest has been completed or failed, you will be unable to exit and re-enter this instance in order to complete this quest.</rgb>
Defeat infected Orcs on the path to Bhol Rûdh
Defeat infected Orcs on the path to Bhol Rûdh.
